pageContext.claim: “The new platform of the Democrat Party is to abolish ICE -- the brave, brave people of ICE. In other words, they want to abolish immigration enforcement entirely.”
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have been calling to abolish U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, but it’s not a widely held position and some Democrats say the agency should be reformed, not abolished. In any case, ICE is only one of several agencies tasked with immigration enforcement.
